properties.Current status: Bank erosion on both sides during rainy days.
properties.Description:
Construction of leader drain across streams -1m(W)x1m(H)
Vegetative cover improving with Areca nut seedling @ 1.5m spacing in a single row, Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal Del/ Kekuna/ randomly mixed seedlings and dense planting at 500mm grid interval, applying of compost manure, NPK fertilizer, mulching with straw/ banana tree skin and maintenance
Stream / canal reservation protection by earth filling of strip of 1.5m to 2m wide and average Depth of 0.5m, Turfing to new sloping soil surface (DAD D 01) or planting single row of vetiver grass with eco-friendly edible plants like Gotukola, Mukunuwenna, Thampala etc including application of compost manure and 02 months maintenance
